text: Tor Albert Ersdal (born 10 January 1972) is a Norwegian rower. He competed in the men's lightweight double sculls event at the 1996 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1972 births Category:Living people Category:Norwegian male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of Norway Category:Rowers at the 1996 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Stavanger
title: Tor Albert Ersdal
